Localization.Name: ActiveWear Training Shorts Khaki
Localization.Description: Standard issue ActiveWear training shorts are constructed from four-way stretch fabric technology to allow for increased airflow and a larger range of motion while keeping you cool and dry during the most intensive training sessions.
